name: Avocado Toast
ingredients: 2 slices of bread, 1 avocado, salt, pepper, olive oil

name: Eggs and Toast
ingredients: 2 slices of whole wheat bread, 1 avocado, 1, tomatoes and 3 sunny side up eggs

name: Greek Salad
ingredients: 1 cucumber, 2 tomatoes, 1 red onion, feta cheese, olives, olive oil, vinegar, salt, pepper

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: 1 cup broccoli, 1 bell pepper, 1 carrot, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, sesame oil

name: Pasta Primavera
ingredients: 200g pasta, 1 zucchini, 1 bell pepper, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, olive oil, garlic, basil

name: Oatmeal with Berries
ingredients: 1 cup rolled oats, 2 cups milk, 1/2 cup mixed berries, honey, cinnamon
